Video Library

Current selection of videos for the DoseControl dosimetry system. Find out how to install, configuration and use DoseControl, or watch a demostration of the system.

Install and Upgrade Dosecontrol

Return to top
Link Title Description Date
Watch SQL Server 2017 Express Edition Installation For DoseControl Basic License Users: The basic setup requires MS SQL Server Express installed on the same PC workstation on which you will install DoseControl. Installing MS SQL Server Express takes only a few minutes. After you install MS SQL Express, you should install SSMS (SQL Server Management Studio), which will allow you to access your SQL Server on your PC. 18-Jan-2021
Watch SSMS (SQL Server Management Studio) Installation For DoseControl Basic License Users: In this video, we show you how to install SSMS (SQL Server Management Studio). You should have MS SQL Server Express installed on your PC. Jan. 18, 2021
Watch DoseControl Software Installation DoseControl software installation for Basic License: In this video, we show you how to install DoseControl software. Prior to this, you should have MS SQL Server Express and SSMS installed on your PC. Jan. 18, 2021
Watch DoseControl First Launch: Connecting to the SQL database In this video, we show you how to connect DoseControl to your SQL database. After installing DoseControl software for the first time, when you launch the application you will be prompted to enter a connection string for your SQL Server. Jan. 18, 2021
Watch Backup and Restore Databases in SSMS In this video, we show you how to backup and restore a database in SSMS (SQL Server Management Studio). You should have MS SQL Server Express and SSMS installed on your PC. You should backup your DoseControl database on a regular basis. When you upgrade to a new version of DoseControl, you should always make a backup copy of your database prior to upgrading. If there is any issue you can simply restore your original database. Jan. 18, 2021

How To Configure Dosecontrol

Return to top
Link Title Description Date
Watch How to setup Pathways, Dosimeter Types and Batches This video describes how to configure DoseControl dosimetry software. Before you can use DoseControl to measure dosimeters, you must first set up all your information. This video is Part 1 of a series about how to setup your dosimetry process information the software, and covers the following:
  • Pathways (Irradiation pathways)
  • Dosimeter Types (B3, FWT, Harwell Red/Amber Perspex, CTA)
  • Batches (Dosimeter batches)
 Jan 01, 2021
Watch How to set up Readers (Spectrophotometers) This video is Part 2 of a series about how to setup your dosimetry process in DoseControl software, and covers how to configure your readers (spectrophotometers) in DoseControl. Jan 01, 2021
How to Configure Calibrations This video is Part 3 of a series about how to setup your dosimetry process in DoseControl software, and covers how to configure Calibrations (dosimeter batch calibrations) in DoseControl. Not available
Watch Configure Dosimeter Re-Reads This video is Part 4 of a series about how to setup your dosimetry process in DoseControl software, and covers how to configure Calibrations (dosimeter batch calibrations) in DoseControl. DoseControl gives you the ability to set up how a user re-reads a dosimeter, and for what reason. Sometimes it is necessary to re-read a dosimeter, such as a user error, dirty dosimeter, damaged dosimeter, etc. In the event a user needs to re-read (re-measure) a dosimeter, they can select from the list of reasons that you setup in a drop-down menu. You can also define the number of re-reads that can be executed, and the method of the re-read (simple or statistical). Jan 01, 2021
Configure Report Types and Data Fields This video demonstrates how to configure dosimetry report headers in DoseControl software. Before using DoseControl to measure dosimeters, you must set up at least one report type. In this video, we demonstrate the setup of a routine dosimetry report with several headers for a specific process. Not available

How to Configure and Use Reports in DoseControl

Link Title Description Date
Overview - Dosimetry Reports in Dosecontrol In this video, we show how dosimetry reports work:
  • how to process a complete report,
  • how to export or print a report to Excel and PDF,
  • how to add a comment to a report
  • how to make changes to the report information
 Not available
Watch How to Setup an E-beam Energy Test Report for Excel In this video, I demonstrate how to create an Excel dosimetry report in the DoseControl software. Next, I show how to setup the software so that you can create dosimetry report with specialized fields specifically for an E-beam energy test using a RisØ wedge. Jan 18, 2021

Using the DoseControl Dosimetry System

Return to top
Link Title Description Date
Watch Procedure for Dosimeter Measurement, Re-reads, and Skips This video provides the basic instructions for how to measure a dosimeter using the DoseControl system. We show how to:
  • Create a new report
  • Open the measurement screen and zero the reader (spectrophotometer)
  • Enter the dosimeter ID or scan the barcode of the dosimeter's ID
  • Press the measure button to get the absorbance and dose
  • Enter a position and tote ID for the dosimeter
  • Re-read the dosimeter
  • Skip a dosimeter measurement
 Jan 01, 2021
Watch Using the Performance Verification Test Module in DoseControl This video shows how to use the Performance Verification (P.V.) module in DoseControl to do a P.V. test for the Evolution 220 spectrophotometer. This PV module is intended as a fast, convenient way to monitor the spectrophotometer's performance, and is part of the DoseControl software. Final PV reports are secure PDFs that can be saved or printed. The PV module is configured by the application admin to be used as a 'daily check' or other timeframe to test the spectrophotometer's photometric and wavelength accuracy. It uses a single photometric standard and takes 1-3 minutes to complete. Dec 1, 2019

Demos of the DoseControl Dosimetry System

Return to top
Link Title Description Date
Watch Demo: Measuring DoseStix dosimeters on Evo220-DoseControl system This video demonstrates how to use the new Evolution 220-DoseControl dosimetry system to measure B3DoseStix dosimeters. You can see details about the Evo220 spectrophotometer, including how the custom dosimeter holders work and how to insert a dosimeter. Also, you will see details about the DoseControl software's measurement screen and how the measurement information is recorded. Sep 26, 2017
Watch Demo: Measuring Harwell Red/Amber Perspex on the Evo220-DoseControl system A quick overview of the process for measuring Harwell Red/Amber Perspex dosimeters on GEX's new Evolution200-DoseControl dosimetry system. The measurement hardware includes an integrated laser micrometer so that it collects dosimeter thickness data while it reads the absorbance. The DoseControl software maintains all the measurement information (21CFR Part 11 compliant software). Oct 5, 2017
Watch Demo: Measuring B3 DoseStix on the Gen 30-DoseControl system system This video demonstrates how to use the new Gen 30-DoseControl dosimetry system to measure B3DoseStix dosimeters (as well as B3 WINdose or FWT dosimeters). You can see details about the Genesys 30 spectrophotometer, including how the custom dosimeter holders work and how to insert a dosimeter. Also, you will see details about the DoseControl software's measurement screen and how the measurement information is recorded. Sep 26, 2017
Watch Quick Demo: G30-DoseControl system to measure dosimeters This is a short demo of showing the the G30-Dosecontrol dosimetry system to measure dosimeters. When you press the "Measure" button in the software, the internal barcode scanner reads the dosimeter ID and the spectrophotometer measures the dosimeter's absorbance. This provides measurement traceability for each individual dosimeter. Dec 23, 2020
Watch Quick Demo - Closeup of DoseControl's internal barcode scanner In this video we are measuring B3 DoseStix dosimeters in a GENESYS 30 spectrophotometer using the DoseControl dosimetry system. DoseControl captures dosimeter absorbance while reading the dosimeter's ID with an internal barcode scanner. Dec 23, 2020
Watch Quick Demo - Using the Audit Trail This video provides a short demonstration of DoseControl's audit trail feature.
  • DoseControl permanently records all actions and dosimeter activities.
  • You can filter by many different types of events, such as User Access, Date Range, Dosimeter ID, Spectrophotometer, and more.
  • Create Audit Trail report of your filtered results.
 Jan 18, 2021
Watch Performance Verification (P.V.) of the Evo 220 Reader (Passing the test) In this video, we demonstrate the use of the Performance Verification module (P.V.) in DoseControl. The P.V. module is used for "daily checks" of the Evolution 220 spectrophotometer, and tests that the instrument is performing within the acceptable range for photometric and wavelength accuracy. We demonstrate how a user opens the P.V. module and executes a test. In this example, all the test passes within the parameters, and the final result of the test is "PASS". Next, the user can begin dosimeter measurements. Jan 01, 2021
Watch Performance Verification (P.V.) of the Evo 220 Reader (FAILED TEST) In this video, we demonstrate the use of the Performance Verification module (P.V.) in DoseControl. The P.V. module is used for "daily checks" of the Evolution 220 spectrophotometer, and tests that the instrument is performing within the acceptable range for photometric and wavelength accuracy. We demonstrate how a user opens the P.V. module and executes a test. In this example, all the test passes within the parameters, and the final result of the test is "FAIL". If the P.V. test fails, the user cannot measure dosimeters with the Evo220 until the test has been passed 2 additional times. If the reader continues to fail the P.V. test, further investigation is needed. Jan 01, 2021
